extDescription.message: Make sound response when events happen

options_sound_clickOrDropFile.message: Click or drop new sound here.
options_sound_clickOrDropFile.description: Droppable zone for upload new sound file.

options_btn_changeSound.description: When file already picked and player appear, user can click this button to switch to 'droppable' UI, to pick another file.

options_warning_unsupportedMedia.message:
This media type maybe unable to play.
$type$
options_warning_unsupportedMedia.description: When upload a file seems can't be played by <audio>, this warning is shown below the player.

options_title_btn_sound_moveBack.message: Move this sound backward from current position

options_title_btn_sound_moveNext.message: Move this sound afterward from current position

options_title_warning_eventForbidden.message: This type requires additional permission, you can review permissions by click "Permission" button
options_title_warning_eventForbidden.description: When selected event type has no sufficient permission, this title will be served as tooltip on event 'Type'.

options_title_btn_event_moveUp.message: Move this event up from current position

options_title_btn_event_moveDown.message: Move this event down from current position

options_event_soundNotSet.description: If user didn't select a sound, Event table show this text for 'Sound' column.

options_perms_desc_webNavigation.description: description about 'webNavigation' permission, should be identical to 'webextPerms.description.webNavigation' in https://hg.mozilla.org/l10n-central/zh-TW/file/default/browser/chrome/browser/browser.properties (change `zh-TW` to your locale).

options_info_saveSuccess.description: Little info text shown near Save button, when success

options_info_saveFail.description: Little info text shown near Save button, when fail
